1pFormatHint.description: English: One filter per line. A filter can be a plain hostname, or an Adblock Plus-compatible filter. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored.
1pFormatHint.message: Један филтер по реду. Филтер може бити назив хоста или филтер компатибилан са Adblock Plus форматом. Редови са префиксом ‘!’ ће бити игнорисани.

1pPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

3pExternalListObsolete.description: a filter list is 'out of date' (possibly needs to be updated)

3pExternalListsHint.description: English: One URL per line. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored. Invalid URLs will be silently ignored.
3pExternalListsHint.message: Једна адреса по реду. Редови са префиксом ‘!’ ће бити игнорисани. Неисправне адресе ће бити тихо игнорисане.

3pLastUpdate.description: English: Last update: {{ago}}, where 'ago' will be replaced with something like '2 days ago'

3pListsOfBlockedHostsPrompt.description: English: {{netFilterCount}} network filters ＋ {{cosmeticFilterCount}} cosmetic filters from:

3pPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo.description:
This option enables the parsing and enforcing of Adblock Plus-compatible 'element hiding' filters. These filters are essentially cosmetic, they serve to hide elements in a web page which are deemed to be a visual nuisance, and which can't be blocked by the net request-based filtering engine.

Enabling this feature increases uBlock Origin's memory footprint.
3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo.message:
This option enables the parsing and enforcing of Adblock Plus-compatible “element hiding” filters. These filters are essentially cosmetic, they serve to hide elements in a web page which are deemed to be a visual nuisance, and which can't be blocked by the net request-based filtering engine.

Enabling this feature increases uBlock₀'s memory footprint.

3pParseAllABPHideFiltersPrompt1.description: English: Parse and enforce Adblock+ element hiding filters.

aboutPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

aboutResetDataConfirm.description: Message asking user to confirm reset
aboutResetDataConfirm.message:
Сва ваша подешавања ће бити обрисана и µBlock ће се поново покренути.

Врати µBlock на првобитна подешавања?

aboutRestoreDataConfirm.description: Message asking user to confirm restore
aboutRestoreDataConfirm.message:
All your settings will be overwritten using data backed up on {{time}}, and uBlock₀ will restart.

Overwrite all existing settings using backed up data?

aboutRestoreDataError.description: Message to display when an error occurred during restore
aboutRestoreDataError.message: The data could not be read or is invalid

popupPowerSwitchInfo.description:
English: Click: disable/enable uBlock₀ for this site.

Ctrl+click: disable uBlock₀ only on this page.
popupPowerSwitchInfo.message:
Клик: искључити/укључити µBlock за ову локацију.

Ctrl+клик: искључити/укључити µBlock само за ову страницу.

popupTipDashboard.description: English: Click to open the dashboard

popupTipGlobalRules.description: Tooltip when hovering the top-most cell of the global-rules column.
popupTipGlobalRules.message: Global rules: this column is for rules which apply to all sites.

popupTipLocalRules.description: Tooltip when hovering the top-most cell of the local-rules column.
popupTipLocalRules.message:
Local rules: this column is for rules which apply to the current site only.
Local rules override global rules.

popupTipLog.description: Tooltip used for the logger icon in the panel

popupTipNoCosmeticFiltering.description: English: Toggle cosmetic filtering for this site
popupTipNoCosmeticFiltering.message: Укључи/искључи козметичко филтерисање за овај сајт

popupTipNoPopups.description: English: Toggle the blocking of all popups for this site
popupTipNoPopups.message: Укључи или искључи блокирање свих искачућих прозора за овај сајт

popupTipNoRemoteFonts.description: English: Toggle the blocking of remote fonts for this site
popupTipNoRemoteFonts.message: Укључи/искључи блокирање удаљених фонтова за овај сајт

popupTipNoStrictBlocking.description: English: Toggle strict blocking for this site
popupTipNoStrictBlocking.message: Укључи/искључи строго блокирање за овај сајт

popupTipRevertRules.description: Tooltip when hovering over the eraser in the dynamic filtering pane.

popupTipSaveRules.description: Tooltip when hovering over the padlock in the dynamic filtering pane.
popupTipSaveRules.message: Click to make your changes permanent.

rulesEditDiscard.description: Will discard manually-edited content and exit manual-edit mode

rulesEditSave.description: Will save manually-edited content and exit manual-edit mode

rulesFormatHint.description: English: dynamic rule syntax and full documentation.

rulesRevert.description: This will remove all temporary rules

settingsContextMenuPrompt.message: Користи контекстни мени где је прикладно

whitelistPrompt.description: English: Your list of host names for which uBlock₀ will be disabled. One host name per line. Invalid host names will be silently ignored.
whitelistPrompt.message: Your list of host names for which uBlock₀ will be disabled. One entry per line. Invalid host names will be silently ignored.
